combat1.name: Normal Attack: Soloist's Solicitation
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a solo dance, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents and changing her Arkhe alignment. If Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters summoned by her Elemental Skill "Salon Solitaire" is present, their lineup will switch in response.

<color=#FFD780FF>Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular</color>
At intervals, when Furina's Normal Attacks hit, a Spiritbreath Thorn or a Surging Blade will descend based on her current Arkhe alignment, dealing Pneuma- or Ousia-aligned <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.
When Furina takes the field, her starting Arkhe alignment will be Ousia.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a solo dance, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents and changing her Arkhe alignment. If Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters summoned by her Elemental Skill "Salon Solitaire" is present, their lineup will switch in response.

Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular
At intervals, when Furina's Normal Attacks hit, a Spiritbreath Thorn or a Surging Blade will descend based on her current Arkhe alignment, dealing Pneuma- or Ousia-aligned Hydro DMG.
When Furina takes the field, her starting Arkhe alignment will be Ousia.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combat2.name: Salon Solitaire
combat2.descriptionRaw: Invites the guests of the Salon Solitaire to come forth and aid in Furina's performance. Will summon either the Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters based on Furina's current Arkhe alignment. Ousia Foaming bubbles like celebrants shall dance, dealing AoE Hydro DMG based on Furina's Max HP and summoning 3 Salon Members: the Ball Octopus-shaped Gentilhomme Usher, the Bubbly Seahorse-shaped Surintendante Chevalmarin, and the Armored Crab-shaped Mademoiselle Crabaletta. They will attack nearby opponents at intervals, prioritizing the target of the active character, dealing Hydro DMG based on Max HP. When they attack, if character(s) with more than 50% HP are nearby, the Members will increase their current attack's power based on the number of such characters, and consume said characters' HP. If 1/2/3/4 (or more) characters meet these requirements, the Members' attacks will deal 110%/120%/130%/140% of their original DMG. Pneuma Summons the Singer of Many Waters, who will heal nearby active character(s) based on Max HP at intervals. The Salon Members and Singer of Many Waters share a duration, and when Furina uses her Charged Attack to change the guest type, the new guests will inherit the remaining duration. While the Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters is on the field, Furina can move on the water's surface. A fixed roster of regulars frequent Furina's Salon Solitaire. At other times, Mademoiselle Crabaletta, Surintendante Chevalmarin, and Gentilhomme Usher shall visit, and on gloomy Wednesdays, it is the singer who comes by.
combat2.description:
Invites the guests of the Salon Solitaire to come forth and aid in Furina's performance. Will summon either the Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters based on Furina's current Arkhe alignment.

Ousia
Foaming bubbles like celebrants shall dance, dealing AoE Hydro DMG based on Furina's Max HP and summoning 3 Salon Members: the Ball Octopus-shaped Gentilhomme Usher, the Bubbly Seahorse-shaped Surintendante Chevalmarin, and the Armored Crab-shaped Mademoiselle Crabaletta.
They will attack nearby opponents at intervals, prioritizing the target of the active character, dealing Hydro DMG based on Max HP.
When they attack, if character(s) with more than 50% HP are nearby, the Members will increase their current attack's power based on the number of such characters, and consume said characters' HP. If 1/2/3/4 (or more) characters meet these requirements, the Members' attacks will deal 110%/120%/130%/140% of their original DMG.

Pneuma
Summons the Singer of Many Waters, who will heal nearby active character(s) based on Max HP at intervals.

The Salon Members and Singer of Many Waters share a duration, and when Furina uses her Charged Attack to change the guest type, the new guests will inherit the remaining duration.
While the Salon Members or the Singer of Many Waters is on the field, Furina can move on the water's surface.
combat2.flavorText: A fixed roster of regulars frequent Furina's Salon Solitaire. At other times, Mademoiselle Crabaletta, Surintendante Chevalmarin, and Gentilhomme Usher shall visit, and on gloomy Wednesdays, it is the singer who comes by.

labels: Gentilhomme Usher HP Consumption|{param6:F1P} Max HP
Surintendante Chevalmarin HP Consumption|{param7:F1P} Max HP
Mademoiselle Crabaletta HP Consumption|{param8:F1P} Max HP
Singer of Many Waters Healing|{param9:F2P} Max HP+{param10:I}

combat3.name: Let the People Rejoice
combat3.descriptionRaw: Rouses the impulse to revel, creating a stage of foam that will deal AoE Hydro DMG based on Furina's Max HP and cause nearby party members to enter the Universal Revelry state: During this time, when nearby party members' HP increases or decreases, 1 Fanfare point will be granted to Furina for each percentage point of their Max HP by which their HP changes. At the same time, Furina will increase the DMG dealt by and Incoming Healing Bonus of all nearby party members based on the amount of Fanfare she has. When the duration ends, Furina's Fanfare points will be cleared. "Cheer! Give praise! Be awed! Raise your glasses! Every night bereft of banqueting is a sordid squandering of sore, sober daylight... And, uh, those who are not yet of age may have grape juice instead!"
combat3.description:
Rouses the impulse to revel, creating a stage of foam that will deal AoE Hydro DMG based on Furina's Max HP and cause nearby party members to enter the Universal Revelry state: During this time, when nearby party members' HP increases or decreases, 1 Fanfare point will be granted to Furina for each percentage point of their Max HP by which their HP changes.
At the same time, Furina will increase the DMG dealt by and Incoming Healing Bonus of all nearby party members based on the amount of Fanfare she has.
When the duration ends, Furina's Fanfare points will be cleared.
combat3.flavorText: "Cheer! Give praise! Be awed! Raise your glasses! Every night bereft of banqueting is a sordid squandering of sore, sober daylight... And, uh, those who are not yet of age may have grape juice instead!"

labels: Fanfare to DMG Increase Conversion Ratio|{param5:F2P}
Fanfare to Incoming Healing Bonus Conversion Ratio|{param6:F2P}

passive1.name: Endless Waltz
passive1.descriptionRaw: When the active character in your party receives healing, if the source of the healing is not Furina herself and the healing overflows, then Furina will heal nearby party members for 2% of their Max HP once every 2s for the next 4s.
passive1.description: When the active character in your party receives healing, if the source of the healing is not Furina herself and the healing overflows, then Furina will heal nearby party members for 2% of their Max HP once every 2s for the next 4s.

passive2.name: Unheard Confession
passive2.descriptionRaw:
Every 1,000 points of Furina's Max HP can buff the different Arkhe-aligned <color=#FFD780FF>Salon Solitaire</color> in the following ways:
Will increase Salon Members' DMG dealt by 0.7%, up to a maximum of 28%.
Will decrease the Singer of Many Waters' healing interval for nearby active characters by 0.4%, up to a maximum of 16%.
passive2.description:
Every 1,000 points of Furina's Max HP can buff the different Arkhe-aligned Salon Solitaire in the following ways:
Will increase Salon Members' DMG dealt by 0.7%, up to a maximum of 28%.
Will decrease the Singer of Many Waters' healing interval for nearby active characters by 0.4%, up to a maximum of 16%.

passive3.name: The Sea Is My Stage
passive3.descriptionRaw: Xenochromatic Fontemer Aberrant ability CD decreased by 30%.
passive3.description: Xenochromatic Fontemer Aberrant ability CD decreased by 30%.
